mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ADMINNOTICE
SELECT * FROM USERS

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM as rn ,a.* FROM( SELECT b.BIDX,p.PIDX,b.BORDER_NUM,p.PNAME,b.TOTAL_PRICE as price,p.PORDER_PRICE,b.BORDER_STATUS,b.BDATE FROM BUYS b left outer join PRODUCTS p on p.DIDX =b.DIDX left outer join buys_options bo on bo.bidx=b.bidx WHERE b.UIDX =${uidx} AND b.PDIDX =${didx} AND P.PIDX = b.PIDX group by b.BIDX,p.PIDX,b.BORDER_NUM,p.PNAME,b.TOTAL_PRICE,p.PORDER_PRICE,b.BORDER_STATUS,b.BDATE ORDER BY BDATE DESC ) a) WHERE rn BETWEEN ${beginRecord} AND ${endRecord}

SELECT * FROM BANNER
SELECT * FROM POPUPNOTICE
